alert.note: Alert for Dauphin; Lebanon (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 7:27PM EDT until June 03 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL DAUPHIN AND NORTHWESTERN LEBANON COUNTIES... At 727 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lykens, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Harrisburg, Hershey, Colonial Park, Progress, Middletown, Linglestown, Hummelstown, Paxtonia, Rutherford, Skyline View, Lawnton and Bressler-Enhaut-Oberlin. This includes the following Interstates... The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 251 to 253. Interstate 81 from mile markers 66 to 82. Interstate 83 from mile markers 44 to 50. Interstate 283 near mile marker 2. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
